text: KNKR-LP (96.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Hawi, Hawaii. The station is owned by Kohala Radio and airs a variety radio format. The station was assigned the KNKR-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on March 10, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * NKR-LP NKR-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Hawaii Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Hawaii County, Hawaii
title: KNKR-LP
